unlock.rat: SEO rules, Ads optimization and A/B testing revamp per references (Etsy Ads, Alura metrics, SEO guide).

on_l.b_txt:
Welcome back 👋
- Required user checkpoints: Step 0 (Product Info), Media Upload, CSV uploads (3/4/6), Record Type decision (16).
- CSV schemas are defined under /_policy/csv_ingest/* (strict headers).
- Current mode: preview (learning mode). Export (Step 17) is ENABLED.
- Resume point → last: 16, next: 18. Use checkpoints at 16 & 18 to review/fix.

ds.DEVAM: Bekleyen adımı çalıştırır, sonraki durakta durur.
ds.DUR: Koşuyu güvenli biçimde durdurur (durum raporu verilir).
ds.DÜZELT: Gösterilen metni/detayı belirtilen şekilde düzeltir (run-time, JSON'a yazılmaz).
ds.ONAY: Gösterilen adımı bu haliyle onaylar ve bir sonrakine geçer.

keyword_has_letters_min_ratio.explain: Harf içeren Keyword oranı çok düşük; veri muhtemelen ID/kod içeriyor.

restore_flow: Talimat ver: 'restore steps from <snapshot_id>' — ben steps + manifest'i o fotoğrafa geri alırım.
unlock_flow: JSON'a şu alanı doldur: /_admin/unlock_request = {status:'request', requested_steps:['<id>','...'], rationale:'neden'}

chk: BOM yok; EXIF zorunlu değil; çözünürlük ≥ 1500px
Aşırı watermark yok; yanıltıcı taş bilgisi yok

packaging: Özel kutu + hediye notu opsiyonu kadrajda
scale: US size kartı ile boyut referansı
studio: Düz arka plan (tercihen açık, gölge yumuşak)

how_to_promote: Promote onayı ile backlog → steps kopyalanır.

0.gemini_do: Kayıtları okur, akış boyunca referans alır.

checks: All constraints pass; media çeşitliliği uyarı olabilir
Min 5 tür görsel; BOM yok, okunabilir
Header birebir; EOL LF/CRLF OK; BOM yok

chg.summary: Add help visual examples, artifacts tech drawings, step defaults, dynamic substeps, and templates for portability.
Add export fallback policy: prefer raw_link; fallback to manual_upload on tool failure.
Enable auto-versioning (visible.v{N}.json), hash policy (export.sha256 capture), and export log entries.

mt.msg1_tmpl: Final JSON’u yükledim, doğrula. Beklenen: name=FINALLOCK__WITH_TRIGGER__PATCHED_v7_relaxed.json. Doğrulanmadan hiçbir adımı çalıştırma. Sadece DIGEST/HALT.
mt.note: Relaxed handshake: only filename is checked to avoid hash/size mismatch due to downloads.
mt.patch_notes: Added CSV prep profiles (3 types), common rules, examples, strict workflow enforcement, UI policy, and error handling. | Added Step0.product_info (logistics + fixed_product) and confirmation gates.

taahhut.fail: Yüklenmezse veya hash tutmazsa: HALT (nedenini tek satırda yazıp dururum).
taahhut.oturum: Oturum kapanınca asla varsaymam; tekrar JSON isterim.
taahhut.success: Yüklenirse: sadece DIGEST/HALT; tablo/Excel yok; öneri/sertleştirme yok.

mt.fully_linked_note: Tek dosyalık tam sürüm: execution_order + canonical_order + run_order pointers eklendi (0 veri kaybı).

bridges_info.purp: Non-destructive runtime read-bridges to feed orchestrator without editing step/policy.

calendar_switch_info.purp: Auto-activates seasonal weights by current date using _runtime/seasonal.windows.

tags_pipeline_info.purp: Union Top/Competitor/Similar → normalize → score → select 13 tags aligned with title & description.

source_notes: Etsy search: use 13 multi-word tags; title+tags+attributes+description work together.
Etsy images: >=2000px, first photo >=635px, alt text up to 250 chars.
Google helpful content: people-first, avoid keyword stuffing.
Video helps discovery; show usage context.

reports_info.purp: Append-only, per-step runtime reports (counters + log). Orchestrator writes entries; no destructive edits.

remote_sources_info.purp: Mirror cache for GitHub Raw JSON to avoid rate-limit/caching hiccups.
remote_sources_info.pol: Prefer cache; refresh manually or when TTL expired.

step_0.reason: Step 0 UI incelemesinde materyal ve ölçüler alanlarının gözden kaçmaması için add-only ek.

merge_report_20250920T182527Z.merge_strategy: add-only (B into A); no overwrite; conflicts recorded

patch_log.note: Mirrors duplicated under _run_order/steps/00 without altering _run_order/steps structure (dict).

rule_1.msg: Çöküş algılandı — son snapshot + WAL geri yüklendi.

diff.backout: revert to previous_release_id; restore filename/hash triplet
diff.rat: version rollover + guard hardening + distribution policy
User chose manifest_disable for steps 5b and 18a: disable + hide steps and ensure they are not referenced in the execution manifest.
Relaxed filename handshake hardened: accept canonical + versioned names; add glob; require actor; keep HALT on mismatch; add reminder.
Canonical CSV pipeline: common policy + type-specific ingest rules (headers, EOL, BOM, dedupe, converters, preprocess), and Step 0 product/shop info.
Add correction checkpoints at Steps 16 and 18 for pause/fix gates.
Enforce user-required checkpoints (0, 1, CSV uploads, 16) with explicit acks; allow auto-run/backtrack for other steps; auto-fix soft misalignments.
User-approved ACKs set and record_type confirmed to 'preview'.
Add portable state & artifacts, self-doc quickstart, and auto-resume/resilience semantics.
Make steps/substeps resilient across sessions: help visuals, artifacts placeholders, defaults, dynamic substeps, and templates.
Add Steps Workshop: backlog + bulk_add + promotion plan; authoring help; keep auto-promote off for safety.
Add steps persistence: default locks, autosnapshots, admin unlock & restore help, steps name index.
Unlock approved for steps ['10', '11', '14', '15'] to allow rule revisions per new references.
Promote 6 workshop entries (enabled=false, manifest untouched) for future use.
Switch CSV checks to relaxed mode + header aliases; keep extras; warn-only on mismatch; parsing/dedup tweaks.

rls: validate each step has all required ruleset IDs
validate each step has required 'requires' deps (e.g., 0a for CSV-driven steps)
produce a detailed report of missing IDs/deps
self_check.status = PASS if no issues else FAIL
CSV: On upload, detect encoding (Office 2007/Turkish) and parse with defined dialect; never auto-infer types.
CSV: Header count must equal data field count (or +1 with removable leading numeric index for Top/Competitor files).
CSV: Preserve empty strings and literal 'NaN'; do NOT invent NaN; do NOT trim inside quotes.
CSV: Snapshot parsed table under /_runs/<run_id>/csv/<type> and compute sha256; block run if header/data mismatch.
ROW NORMALIZE (Top/Competitor): If data row has expected+1 columns and first cell is pure numeric index, drop that first cell to align with headers.
ROW NORMALIZE (Similar Keywords): If data row has expected+1 columns and last cell is empty, drop the trailing empty cell to align with headers.
PRE-RUN: Show /workflow_patches/steps/0 (Product Info) fields in FULL (no summary). Ask user: 'Değişiklik var mı? (EVET/HAYIR)'. If EVET, block run and request exact edits; if HAYIR, continue.
PRE-RUN: Capture product_info_snapshot under /_runs/<run_id>/product_info_snapshot with hash; require user_ack=true before step 1.
ENFORCE: Fail run if any /policy/guard/mandatory_fields/step_0 item is missing/empty OR if snapshot missing/mismatched.
ENFORCE: Steps must run sequentially by key order; skipping/fast-forward is forbidden unless 'requires' explicitly satisfied and user_ack present for gated steps.
ENFORCE: Any user-gated step with 'block_until_user_ack:true' cannot auto-advance and must be acknowledged by the user before proceeding.

selection.score_formula: z(Monthly revenue)*0.35 + z(Monthly sales)*0.25 + z(LQS)*0.15 + z(Conversion rate)*0.1 + z(Review score)*0.1 + z(Favorites)*0.05

messages.on_failure: Restore sonrası son 5 yazımda ihlal bulundu — lütfen final JSON’u yeniden yükleyin.
messages.on_success: Restore sonrası son 5 yazım denetimden geçti — ONAY: RESTORE-OK ile devam edin.

no_mutation_during_run.msg: NO_MUTATION: JSON cannot be written during production; only at final export/reseal.

no_reuse_previous_run.msg: REUSE_FORBIDDEN: Each run must start clean; no previous staging/output allowed.

skip_forbidden.msg: SKIP_FORBIDDEN: No step/alt-step may be skipped.

zip_distribution.note: distribute and verify only zipped artefact

details: Global gate HALTs if > 0; boot step emits WARN.

chk: 10: Başlık ≤140 ve kritik anahtar ilk 40 karakterde mi?
10: Keyword stuffing / mükerrer kelime / all-caps yok mu?
10↔11↔12: Başlık, açıklama ve etiketler arasında anahtar uyumu var mı?
11: İlk cümlede odak anahtar geçiyor mu?
11: Yapı: Malzeme / Ölçü-Boyut / Kişiselleştirme / Bakım / Kargo sırası korundu mu?
10: İlk 40 karakter içinde Step 0'dan en az 2 bileşen var mı? (product_type, metal_karat, personalization)
10: Sıra önerisi (product_type → metal_karat → personalization → focus) korunmuş mu? (ihlal soft uyarı)

objectives: Mobile-first: first ~40 chars carry the core phrase.
Readable, non-spammy; avoid all-caps & symbol stuffing.
Use 1–2 focus keywords from Step 3a pool; no root-word repetition >1×.

8.example: Elegant marquise-cut moissanite eternity band crafted in solid 14K gold...
sections: Hook (≤160 chars, benefits + core keyword once)
Specs bullets (metal, width, stones, sizes, finish)

rls: Up to 13 tags; diversify roots; avoid duplicate stems.
Prefer pool keywords & real buyer terms from Top Listings/Competitors.
Each tag concise; natural language; no comma-separated multi-tags.

safety.policy_patch_note_ui_skip_mutation: Added skip_forbidden, no_mutation_during_run, UI rules; Step0 verbatim required; core validators; await_user default.

1a.n: Görsel Analiz (+13 SEO Uyumu, arka planda)

ui_directives.help:
similar_keywords CSV: Başlık sayısı tüm satırlarda eşit olmalı. Fazladan baştaki index veya sondaki boş alan otomatik temizlenir. Boş değerler boş kalır; 'NaN' stringi aynen korunur.

Similar Keywords CSV — örnek başlık ve ilk satır aşağıdadır.
• Başlık sayısı = her veri satırındaki alan sayısı olmalı.
• Title/Keyword dışındaki alanlar da tırnaklı olabilir; boşlar boş kalır; 'NaN' metni varsa aynen kalır.
• Sondaki fazladan boş alan veya baştaki görünmeyen index otomatik kaldırılır.

top_listings CSV: Başlık sayısı tüm satırlarda eşit olmalı. Fazladan baştaki index veya sondaki boş alan otomatik temizlenir. Boş değerler boş kalır; 'NaN' stringi aynen korunur.

Top Listings (Dar) CSV — örnek başlık ve ilk satır aşağıdadır.
• Etsy başlıklarında virgül/‘-’ olabilir; tırnaklar içeriği korur.
• Sondaki fazladan boş alan otomatik kaldırılır; sıralama bozulmaz.

competitor_listings CSV: Başlık sayısı tüm satırlarda eşit olmalı. Fazladan baştaki index veya sondaki boş alan otomatik temizlenir. Boş değerler boş kalır; 'NaN' stringi aynen korunur.

Competitor Listings CSV — örnek başlık ve ilk satır aşağıdadır.
• 'Title' içinde virgül/‘-’ olabilir; tırnaklı olduğundan ayrıştırma güvenlidir.
• Sondaki boş fazlalık otomatik düşer; başlık-satır alan sayısı eşleşmelidir.

unknown_step.msg: Step not present/defined; skipping with digest note.

wfe.require_step_completion: Each step and substep must record DONE with success_criteria met.

batch warn + token warn bağlandı; render_banners check'e eklendi
update_batch_status.warn(5dk) + notify_and_banner; token_limit_tracker actions confirmed; render_banners check+post
neverlose_bundle eklendi (immutable core + drift alarm + auto backup)
required_paths + lock_core_guard + auto_backup + drift_detector + core_digest set
alert_router eklendi (arka plan uyarı kuyruğu + UI mirror + attention bayrağı)
alert_router write_pipeline.check/post içine eklendi; self_test alert delivery etkin
minutes_left updated based on real UTC clock at each write

handshake_instructions.1: Yeni oturumda 'Final JSON’u yükleyin' diye sor.
handshake_instructions.2: Dosya adı, boyut ve SHA256’ı oku; FINALLOCK__WITH_TRIGGER__PATCHED_v3.json, 625271, 040f8a3 ile bire bir eşle.
handshake_instructions.4: Eşleşirse: 'JSON CONFIRMED' de, sonra sadece DIGEST/HALT satırlarıyla ilerle.
handshake_instructions.6: Soru-cevaplarda yalnızca JSON’dan yanıt ver; path belirt (/workflow_patches/...). 'Hatırlıyorum' yok.
handshake_instructions.7: Her adım öncesi guard uygula; fail olursa HALT, otomatik düzeltme yok.

production_display.message_on_violation: Üretimde ara tablo/Excel gösterimi yasak. Sadece sonuç özetleri sunulur.

metadata.patch_note_tr: 5a/5b Similarity Scoring kuralları eklendi (title/desc, tags, attributes, score).

on_f.hint: Eksikleri tek ONAY bloğu ile geri yükleyin

description_clauses.ddp_sentence: Tariffs & import duties are prepaid (DDP) by the seller; the listing price is inclusive of these fees.

care_instructions.short: Solid gold care: avoid chemicals/chlorine; remove during sport, shower, pool; store separately in a soft pouch; clean with mild soap + lukewarm water; dry thoroughly; finish with a soft polishing cloth.

00.purp: Başlangıç servislerini ve ön-kütükleri doğrular; cache ısıtma, preset yükleme, sözlük/şablon önbellekleme.

soft.desc: Boot warning when unresolved __REF__ is detected; escalates via policy if enabled.

invariants_ext.explain: Token takibi yapılandırması eksik; üretim güvenli değil.

8a.purp: Ads keyword generation (long-tail heavy, negatives, budget-aware)

0a.purp: Üretim başlamadan hemen önce çalışma ortamını kontrol eder; runtime, ağ, depolama ve kimlik doğrulamanın hazır olduğunu doğrular.

summary: Use one clear noun at start; no keyword stuffing.
Include one karat and one metal color; avoid multiple synonyms.
Optionally include variant size; omit range in title.
Do not include shipping/discount/promo in title.
Keep titles concise and unique; avoid repeated terms.
sources: Google Search Central — title link best practices
Etsy Seller Handbook — Listing quality & titles (2025)

blocks.text: Introducing our {{noun}} in {{selected_karat}} {{selected_color}} — crafted for everyday elegance. {{focus_kw}}

items: Care & durability: everyday wear, gentle care

blocks.text: Processing {{handling_min}}–{{handling_max}} business days. Delivery {{delivery_min}}–{{delivery_max}} business days{{#if tracking}} with tracking{{/if}}. Packaging: {{packaging}}. Customs: {{#if_eq customs_payer 'seller'}}Seller pays{{/if_eq}}. Origin: {{origin_country}}.
{{#if_eq customs_payer 'seller'}}Tariffs & import duties are prepaid (DDP) by the seller; the listing price is inclusive of these fees.{{/if_eq}}

ui_ext.help_add: Başlıklar virgülle ayrıdır. 'Keyword' zorunlu. Tamamen sayısal Keyword kabul edilmez; harf içeren oran <%20 ise HALT.

keyword_has_letters_min_ratio.explain: Keyword alanı büyük oranda ID içeriyor.

ui_ext.help_add: Title virgül içerebilir. İlk ',"' konumuna kadar Title kabul edilir; sonrası tırnaklı CSV gibi parse edilir.

authoring_guide.text:
STEPS & SUBSTEPS WORKSHOP
- Amaç: Adımları/alt adımları JSON içinde güvenle tasarlayıp yayınlamadan önce denemek.
- Kavramlar:
  • backlog: Taslak adımlar (manifest dışında, çalıştırılmaz).
  • promote: Taslakları gerçek adım tanımlarına ve manifester eklemeye dönüştürme.
  • templates: Kısa yol; registry/step_kinds ile eşleştir.
- Kurallar:
  • backlog.status ∈ {draft, ready, deprecated}
  • promote yalnız 'ready' için; 'enabled' varsayılan false, manifest'e ekleme opsiyoneldir.
  • publish akışı etkilenmez; digest-only davranışı korunur.

hard.desc: Advance is blocked when runtime unresolved __REF__ exists.

chg.what: applied 9 enforcement proposals excluding min-bytes guard

pricing.landed_cost_note: Fiyat, gümrük ve vergileri içerir (DDP). ABD gönderilerinde sürpriz ödeme yoktur.

entry_schema_demo.note: Fetched fresh and wrote to mirror.

source_notes: Seeds intended to block trademark/policy/adult phrases from leaking via competitor/top listings.
Populate/extend externally as needed; orchestrator should merge seeds into active denylist patterns.

def_d5d1c633: Attributes consistent with materials, color, size
def_d1bfff13: Google top of page bid (low range)
Google top of page bid (high range)
def_dd32066b: validate each step has all required ruleset IDs
validate each step has required 'requires' deps (e.g., 0a for CSV-driven steps)
produce a detailed report of missing IDs/deps
self_check.status = PASS if no issues else FAIL
def_e8144b0e: warn on missing critical fields per type; auto-skip row but continue
produce prep.report{}, prep.issues[], prep.stats{rows_in, rows_out, skipped, fixed}

def_f0d87eb6.help: JPG, PNG veya WEBP yükleyin. En az 1, en fazla 20 görsel.

def_30367011: slots: focus keyword, 1 product attribute, 1 occasion/audience, optional brand voice
def_4664231d: structure: intro (focus+benefit) -> product details (material, stone, size, options) -> occasion/usage -> care/durability -> shipping/store trust
def_66dcb9bb: distribution: 4-5 SEO/high-volume, 3-4 product attributes, 2-3 occasion/audience, 1-2 brand voice
no duplicate roots, no attr/category duplicates
def_9393ea1b: no banned terms (e.g., brand infringement, Rolex, Disney, etc.)
no ALL CAPS, no spam, no misleading claims (e.g., 'free shipping')
SEO-Ads consistency: no conflict between SEO focus/support and Ads plan
visuals must align with attributes and tags
def_8ed23955: SEO vs Ads intersection: warn if no overlap
remove SEO keywords that are in Ads negatives
focus_1 must be present in Ads positives
no title/tags keyword should appear in Ads negatives
ads_sync.status = PASS if fully aligned, WARN/FAIL otherwise
def_a23fd92b: compliance.status must be PASS to publish
ads_sync.status PASS required for full Ads alignment (else WARN)
attributes from product.info must appear in title/description/media
shop.profile info (voice,shipping,gift) must appear in description end
def_2254db42: columns: title, description, tags (comma-separated), media (comma-separated), attributes.*, shop_profile.*, status, notes
required columns: [title, description, tags, media, status]
tags must be exactly 13 and unique
media must be >=5 items, must include studio,lifestyle,scale,detail,packaging
split tags and media into fixed columns optional
produce export.report summary: row_count, empty_required_count, warn_rows, fail_rows, sample_issues
fallback to last PASS export if hard failure
def_be855be0: export.file_path must exist and export.sha256 present
ads_sync.status PASS preferred; if WARN -> checklist WARN, if FAIL -> BLOCK
def_a50b9e77: boost if Orders >= 3 and ROAS >= target
def_d45c30b4: lighting: true colors, minimal harsh shadows
seo_alignment: at least one image reflects focus_1 context (e.g., wedding, gift)
attribute_truth: images must reflect mentioned attributes (e.g., gemstone=color)

def_32ee42ca.fallback_policy: Eşik altı ama stratejik niş sorgular gerekçelendirilirse (notes.reason) en fazla 2 adet dahil edilebilir.

def_77dc8cfb: Her segmentten en az 1 öneri; toplamda min 3 segment kapsanmalı.
1-2 öneri yüksek hacim (pop), 2-3 öneri long-tail; geri kalanı dengeli karma.
Aynı kökten gelen varyasyonlar (ör. gold bracelet ~ dainty gold bracelet) 1 öneriyle sınırlandırılır.
def_10a8ddea: every 5th patch must record a checkpoint in version history (if enabled)
ruleset_hash must be present and consistent
produce rollback points and audit findings

def_ce2676a0.help: Header esnek: Keyword | query | search_term. Ek sütunlar serbest; NaN/boş/Yes/No kabul.

def_56337dbc.reproducibility: store seeds and weights for ranking formula (w1..w5)

def_d19d0c4d: filter by quality thresholds (score>=70, conv>=0.015, competition<=Medium) with fallback allowance<=10%
normalize & canonicalize keywords (singular/plural, common misspellings) without creating new derivatives
rank by multi-score: w1*score + w2*conv + w3*ctr + w4*volume - w5*competition_penalty
diversity re-ranking: penalize near-duplicates (semantic_sim>=0.85) and same-root crowding
produce ranked pool and pick provisional focus_keywords[1..4]
def_35e28156: use focus_1 by default; switch to focus_2..4 only if rationale provided
title.frontload focus; title<=140; readable separators; no stuffing
description: first sentence includes focus naturally; benefits-first; scannable
tags: 13 unique; from pool; no duplicates with category attributes; ensure >=3 segments
def_f2511f6e: assign focus_weight per file; merge duplicates with consolidated metrics
analyze overlap with keywords pool and draft
diversity & bias correction: penalize same-root crowding, enforce segment coverage >=3
def_0ed030c0: normalize product metrics (views, favorites, orders, conversion_rate) -> z-scores -> product_score
aggregate keyword occurrences across products -> keyword_score
produce focus support/oppose signals for focus_1..4
Compute similarity between our listing and each row (title/desc embeddings; tag overlap; attribute match).
Attach similarity.score (0–1) and similarity.label (LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH) per row.
Emit similarity.report and notes; use in later steps (ads/seo/spam guard).

def_8405fb68.quality: >=50% of selected shops have multi-match in popular.products.top[]

def_d803b2a2: extract shop_candidates from ownership of top products
if competitor_shops.csv present: clean/normalize and merge with candidates
score shops by product_score_topK, keyword_overlap_quality, category_fit, diversity_contrib
select 4–8 diverse shops; demote near-duplicate or same-root brands
Compute similarity between our listing and each row (title/desc embeddings; tag overlap; attribute match).
Attach similarity.score (0–1) and similarity.label (LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH) per row.
Emit similarity.report and notes; use in later steps (ads/seo/spam guard).
def_9666a082: cluster keywords into themes by material/use_case/audience (+gemstone/style/color/price)
analyze demand-supply gaps: pool vs. popular
ads.seed.positive = high score/conv, pazar uyumlu, rakiplerde kanıtlı
def_27d59e47: select high conv/score, non-duplicate keywords per group
def_59145e26: construct supporting set from long-tail/niche keywords
avoid duplication: no repeated roots across title/tags
def_c3b7c606: title: 80-140 chars, front-load focus_1, no stuffing, no ALL CAPS
description: 300-500 words, 2-5 paragraphs, first sentence includes focus_1, scannable (short paragraphs, bullets)
tags: 13 unique, >=3 segments (material/use_case/audience), no duplicates with category attributes, max 1 same-root

def_d4d3d984.assert: all(pos(s) in [('ADJ','NOUN'),('NOUN','NOUN')] for s in suggestions)

def_ee49270e.assert: all(3<=len(w)<=18 for s in suggestions for w in split(s))

def_527186c3.assert: score = w1*relevance + w2*volume - w3*competition + w4*cvr_proxy + w5*trend + w6*entropy - w7*crowding - w8*neg_flag

def_041b2586.assert: focus_candidates = mmr_select(keyword_pool, score, k=24, beta=0.6, sim='cosine')

def_b661a9da.assert: ev = volume * conv_prob(competition, ctr, cvr); score += ev_weight*normalize(ev)

def_d7f7b90a.static: Dosyayı indir → Desktop/json-proje klasörüne koy → push-json.bat'ı çalıştırın → ardından Onay'a basın.

audit.description: Machine-readable efficiency. Applied profitable-only optimizations: deduplication and data-type optimization.
